price: (41) And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire?
arabic: ۞ وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi mā lī adʿūkum ilā al-najati watadʿūnanī ilā al-nāri
